snippet.title: Torchlight: Infinite New Hero Trait Frostbitten Heart is Now Available!
snippet.description:
■ Frostbitten Heart
Keywords: Cold Damage, Cold Pulse, Frostbite
After exhausting all the fire energy within her, Gemma finally realized Zoya's last wish—returning to the far north.
But Zoya gave up her own life and merged all her frost power into Gemma's soul, just to save the latter.

- Frostbitten Heart excels at skills tagged as cold and no longer has bonus when using Fire skills.
- Frostbitten Heart continually releases Cold Pulse to afflict additional Frostbite on enemies.
- After learning "Frostbite Casket", Frostbitten Heart icecovers self upon taking fatal damage and gains 100% damage reduction.
- After learning "Icebound Blade", Frostbitten Heart's Cold Pulse guarantees an explosion upon defeating a frozen target.

*In the next season, it will be possible to exchange Hero Emblems for the Frostbitten Heart hero trait.
